nodes.text: The Haven system was a star system located in the Minos Cluster of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained a small planetoid called Haven and a space that was a rendezvous point, both of which were important bases of operations for the Rebel Alliance.

During the Galactic Civil War, the planetoid Haven served as the site of the Rebel Alliance's primary resistance center in the Minos Cluster. In 3 ABY, shortly after the Battle of Hoth, the Alliance Fleet regrouped at a rendezvous point in the Haven system. Following his duel with Darth Vader on Bespin, Luke Skywalker received his prosthetic hand while in orbit of the planetoid Haven.
